Package main.java.controller

Class BrickController

java.lang.Object
main.java.controller.BrickController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CementBrick, ClayBrick, HealthBrick, SpecialBrick, SteelBrick, VibraniumBrick
public abstract class BrickController
extends java.lang.Object
This abstract BrickController class allows other class to inherit
Author:
Emily

      pos - position of brick
      size - size of brick
      border - border color of the brick
      inner - inner color of the brick
      strength - the strength of the brick

      dir - The direction of the impact
